flawed_nl_solution:
The cut-away part of the pole is 30/100 * 20 = <<30/100*20=200/3>>200/3 meters long.
So the pole is left at the length of 20 - 200/3 = <<20-200/3=-140/3>>-140/3 meters.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 200/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
